name: Crazy Monkey Jungle Match
description:
Switch and match your way through unlimited levels in this addictive puzzle adventure. Ain't it the sweetest game ever?


The super hit game Crazy Monkey Jungle Match is now available for iPhone iPod Touch!
-------------------------------

Crazy Monkey Jungle Match features:
● Excellent graphics that will leave you hungry for more
● Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master
● Unlimited levels
● Leaderboards for you and your friends
● Items to unlock by completing levels
● Boosters and charms to help with those challenging levels
● Seamless synchronization with the Facebook version
-------------------------------
